name: part_004
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2021】ゲストもいっぱい！楽しんじゃお！✨【3DLIVE】 [NuOJhtBC7R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio and Shirakami Fubuki talk with Tokoyami Towa on stage before leaving.
Transition with screen graphics and instrumental music.
Tokoyami Towa performs 'Hyakka Ryouran Hanafubuki' with guests Natsuiro Matsuri and Aki Rosenthal.

subtitles.original: ミオちゃんたち...
subtitles.english: Mio-chan and the others...

subtitles.original: え？まつりとミオちゃんたち...
subtitles.english: Eh? Matsuri and Mio-chan and the others...

subtitles.original: あ、そうそうそう。ミオだけ「トワ様」っていいな！
subtitles.english: Ah, right. It's nice that only Mio calls me "Towa-sama"!

subtitles.original: えー！ずるいずるいずるい！ずるい！
subtitles.english: Eh! No fair, no fair, no fair! No fair!

subtitles.original: 今日からトワも...
subtitles.english: From today, Towa will also...

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんって呼ぶ！
subtitles.english: Call you Fubuki-chan!

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんか...
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan...

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんがいいな、でも。
subtitles.english: But I like Fubuki-chan.

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんがフブキちゃん。
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan is Fubuki-chan.

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: イエイ！やったーやったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! We did it, we did it!

subtitles.original: これ完全にプレゼント！
subtitles.english: This is totally a present!

subtitles.original: やったー！イエイイエイ！やったー！
subtitles.english: Hooray! Yay yay! We did it!

subtitles.original: 全力でやった！
subtitles.english: I gave it my all!

subtitles.original: 踏み出した！
subtitles.english: I took a step forward!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: こんなんでよかったのかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if that was okay?

subtitles.original: よかったのかな？
subtitles.english: Was it okay?

subtitles.original: じゃあ行くぞ、フブキ帰るぞ！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go. Fubuki, let's head back!

subtitles.original: 帰ろう！
subtitles.english: Let's go home!

subtitles.original: はいよ、行くぞ、えい！
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go, hup!

subtitles.original: あー。
subtitles.english: Ah.

subtitles.original: 色づく思いは切ないや... されど爛漫花吹雪
subtitles.english: Blossoming thoughts are painful... yet a brilliant shower of petals

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: ぱっと咲いて散った花は　終わりに実をつけてく
subtitles.english: Flowers that bloom and scatter quickly leave seeds at the end

subtitles.original: その時を待てど暮らせど　音は鈴虫
subtitles.english: Wait as I might for that time, only the sound of crickets remains

subtitles.original: そっと触れて知って　胸の内の温かさを
subtitles.english: Touching gently, I learn of the warmth within my heart

subtitles.original: 初めてのこの気持ちだけ　抱きしめていたい
subtitles.english: I want to hold onto this first feeling alone

subtitles.original: 暁交わした約束は
subtitles.english: The promise exchanged at dawn

subtitles.original: 本物だってきっと信じてる
subtitles.english: I'm sure I believe it's real

subtitles.original: いろはにほへとの　花に魅せられた少女達
subtitles.english: Girls captivated by the transient flowers

subtitles.original: あはなに　はなに　はなに　落ちる花と舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, with the falling petals, petals, petals, dance away

subtitles.original: 迷った袖でも　想い言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Even with hesitant sleeves, I tried putting my feelings into words

subtitles.original: 誰もみな憧れる　現世の理よ
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for the laws of this world

subtitles.original: 色づく思いは切ないや　されど爛漫花吹雪
subtitles.english: Blossoming thoughts are painful, yet a brilliant shower of petals

subtitles.original: ふっと吹き消して　夜を灯す月明かりに
subtitles.english: Suddenly blowing out, in the moonlight that lights the night

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心が揺れて　声は響かず
subtitles.english: A vague heart wavers, and voices do not ring out

subtitles.original: もっと冷たくて　胸をなぞる指先さえ
subtitles.english: Even the colder fingertips that trace my chest

subtitles.original: いつの日か馳せた形を　写し続けてた
subtitles.english: Kept reflecting the form I once longed for

subtitles.original: 浮世の波にたゆたう時
subtitles.english: When swaying in the waves of the floating world

subtitles.original: うたかたの夢ははじけてく
subtitles.english: The fleeting dreams burst away

subtitles.original: 憂いの奥山に　荒れる想い達は純情
subtitles.english: In the deep mountains of sorrow, the raging feelings are pure

subtitles.original: そらりくらり心揺らめき　歌う畦道
subtitles.english: Wavering hearts on the singing path between fields

subtitles.original: 浅き夢見し想い踏み込む　この世界は
subtitles.english: Stepping into this world with shallow dreams and thoughts

subtitles.original: 誰もみな憧れる　現世の理よ
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for the laws of this world

subtitles.original: 色づく思いは切ないや　されど爛漫花吹雪
subtitles.english: Blossoming thoughts are painful, yet a brilliant shower of petals

subtitles.original: いふみ数えて
subtitles.english: Counting one, two, three

subtitles.original: ここにさおいで
subtitles.english: Come over here

subtitles.original: 暁交わした約束は
subtitles.english: The promise exchanged at dawn

subtitles.original: 本物だってきっと信じてる
subtitles.english: I'm sure I believe it's real

subtitles.original: いろはにほへとの　花に魅せられた少女達
subtitles.english: Girls captivated by the transient flowers

subtitles.original: あはなに　はなに　はなに　落ちる花と舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, with the falling petals, petals, petals, dance away

subtitles.original: 迷った袖でも　想い言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Even with hesitant sleeves, I tried putting my feelings into words

subtitles.original: 誰もみな憧れる　現世の理よ
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for the laws of this world

subtitles.original: 色づく思いは切ないや　されど爛漫花吹雪
subtitles.english: Blossoming thoughts are painful, yet a brilliant shower of petals

subtitles.original: 風に舞う運命の純情　咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: The pure feelings of fate dancing in the wind, bloom in full glory

subtitles.original: ふー！やったー！
subtitles.english: Fu~! We did it!

subtitles.original: かっこいい！
subtitles.english: So cool!

subtitles.original: パタパタパタパタ...
subtitles.english: Pata pata pata pata...

subtitles.original: いや、これ扇子で踊るの楽しいね！
subtitles.english: Man, dancing with these fans is fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しいねー！
subtitles.english: It really is!

subtitles.original: ちょっと大人の感じ出せたかな？
subtitles.english: Did we show a bit of our adult side?

subtitles.original: 大人？
subtitles.english: Adult?

subtitles.original: 誰が？
subtitles.english: Who is?
